00040 // Object allocation function
00041 // parameters are: the class, the parent object (eventually 0), the object name (eventually empty)
00042 typedef KviKvsObject * (*KviKvsObjectAllocateInstanceProc)(KviKvsObjectClass *,KviKvsObject *,const QString &);
00043 
00044 // An object function callback
00045 typedef bool (KviKvsObject::*KviKvsObjectFunctionHandlerProc)(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall * pCall);
00046 
00047 
00048 // The descriptor of a kvirc object class
00049 
00050 class KVIRC_API KviKvsObjectClass
00051 {
00052         friend class KviKvsObject;
00053         friend class KviKvsObjectController;
00054 public:
00055         KviKvsObjectClass(
00056                         KviKvsObjectClass * pParent,            // parent class
00057                         const QString & szName,                 // class name
00058                         KviKvsObjectAllocateInstanceProc proc,  // intance allocation proc
00059                         bool bBuiltin = true                    // this is a builtin or script based class ?
00060                 );
00061         ~KviKvsObjectClass();
00062 protected:
00063         KviKvsObjectClass                           * m_pParentClass;      // the parent (base) class
00064         QString                                       m_szName;            // the class name
00065         bool                                          m_bBuiltin;          // is this a builtin or script based class ?
00066         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsObjectFunctionHandler>          * m_pFunctionHandlers; // all our function handlers
00067         KviPointerList<KviKvsObjectClass>               * m_pChildClasses;     //
00068         KviKvsObjectAllocateInstanceProc              m_allocProc;
00069         bool                                          m_bDirty;            // not yet flushed to disk (only for not builtin classes)
00070 protected:
00071         void registerChildClass(KviKvsObjectClass *pClass);
00072         void unregisterChildClass(KviKvsObjectClass *pClass);
00073         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsObjectFunctionHandler> * functionHandlers(){ return m_pFunctionHandlers; };
00074 public:
00075         void clearDirtyFlag(){ m_bDirty = false; };
00076         bool isDirty(){ return m_bDirty; };
00077         bool isBuiltin(){ return m_bBuiltin; };
00078         bool isScriptHandler(const QString & szFunctionName)
00079         {
00080             KviKvsObjectFunctionHandler *pFunctionHandler=m_pFunctionHandlers->find(szFunctionName);
00081             if (pFunctionHandler) return pFunctionHandler->isScriptHandler();
00082             else return false;
00083         };
00084         const QString & name(){ return m_szName; };
00085         KviKvsObjectClass * parentClass(){ return m_pParentClass; };
00086         // pProc CAN'T be zero here!
00087         void registerFunctionHandler(const QString & szFunctionName,KviKvsObjectFunctionHandlerProc pProc,unsigned int uFlags = 0);
00088         void registerFunctionHandler(const QString & szFunctionName,const QString &szBuffer,unsigned int uFlags = 0);
00089 
00090         // registers an empty handler that returns "nothing"
00091         void registerStandardNothingReturnFunctionHandler(const QString & szFunc);
00092         // retisters an empty handler that returns $true
00093         void registerStandardTrueReturnFunctionHandler(const QString & szFunc);
00094         // retisters an empty handler that returns $false
00095         void registerStandardFalseReturnFunctionHandler(const QString & szFunc);
00096 
00097         KviKvsObjectFunctionHandler * lookupFunctionHandler(const QString & szFunc){ return m_pFunctionHandlers->find(szFunc); };
00098         KviKvsObject * allocateInstance(KviKvsObject * pParent,const QString &szName,KviKvsRunTimeContext * pContext,KviKvsVariantList * pParams);
00099 
00100         bool save(const QString &szFileName);
00101         static bool load(const QString &szFileName);
00102         void getFunctionCode(QString &szCode,KviKvsObjectFunctionHandler &h);
00103         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsObjectFunctionHandler> * getHandlers(){return m_pFunctionHandlers;};
00104 
00105 };
